order.instructions: Used to order the rooms on the main /rooms page. If not used rooms will be listed in the order they were added.

url_friendly_name.instructions: Add only the last part of the url. For https://www.frederickhotelnyc.com/rooms/superior-single/ you would only add superior-single

banner_image.instructions: This is the banner or 'hero' image at the top of the page.

excerpt_image.instructions: This image will go on the /rooms page excerpt. If this is blank the banner image will be used.

gallery1.instructions: This image will go at the bottom of the page. It will only be used if all three gallery images are added.

gallery2.instructions: This image will go at the bottom of the page. It will only be used if all three gallery images are added.
